TopicTitle: Mod to disable the "warp to here" button.

Articles.Content: So, Squad's "Warp to Here" button is an ergonomic disaster. It's far to easy to click accidentally and it doesn't work anyway. Can anyone make a plugin that would disable it permanently?
What do you mean? What "warp to here" button?

> 
> So, Squad's "Warp to Here" button is an ergonomic disaster. It's far to easy to click accidentally and it doesn't work anyway. Can anyone make a plugin that would disable it permanently?

I waited this function for a long time but I don't like to need to click on the orbit to use it :'(. I've looked on the API and I haven't found something which can easily disable it, perhaps someone who has a higher level on mod could find something ...

I've found the "Warp To" function on the class "TimeWarp" and the GUI on "OrbitTargeter" ... 

> 
> What do you mean? What "warp to here" button?

On an orbit, you can click to "warp to here" ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)
